languages.text: {n}Не дожидаясь окончания фразы, провидец вдруг поворачивает голову к Ирлиэт. Впервые за все время его взгляд ясен и собран:{/n} "Дитя, ты вернулась к нам в темный час..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Не дожидаясь окончания фразы, провидец вдруг поворачивает голову к Ирлиэт. Впервые за все время его взгляд ясен и собран:{/n} "Дитя, ты вернулась к нам в темный час..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer03

languages.text: {n}Without waiting for Yrliet to finish her sentence, the Farseer suddenly turns his head toward her. For the first time, his gaze is clear and focused.{/n} "Child, you have returned to us at a dark hour..."
languages.original_text: {n}Не дожидаясь окончания фразы, провидец вдруг поворачивает голову к Ирлиэт. Впервые за все время его взгляд ясен и собран:{/n} "Дитя, ты вернулась к нам в темный час..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Without waiting for Yrliet to finish her sentence, the Farseer suddenly turns his head toward her. For the first time, his gaze is clear and focused.{/n} "Child, you have returned to us at a dark hour..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer03

languages.text: {n}Sin esperar a que Yrliet termine la frase, el vidente gira bruscamente la cabeza en su dirección. Por primera vez, su mirada parece despejada y concentrada.{/n} «Niña, en mala hora vuelves con nosotros...».
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for Yrliet to finish her sentence, the Farseer suddenly turns his head toward her. For the first time, his gaze is clear and focused.{/n} "Child, you have returned to us at a dark hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin esperar a que Yrliet termine la frase, el vidente gira bruscamente la cabeza en su dirección. Por primera vez, su mirada parece despejada y concentrada.{/n} «Niña, en mala hora vuelves con nosotros...».
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer03

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの話が終わるのを待たずに、先見司は突然彼女のほうへ振り向いた。そのまなざしは初めてはっきりと焦点を合わせた。{/n}「我が子よ、君は暗黒の時に我らのもとに戻ってきた…」
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for Yrliet to finish her sentence, the Farseer suddenly turns his head toward her. For the first time, his gaze is clear and focused.{/n} "Child, you have returned to us at a dark hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの話が終わるのを待たずに、先見司は突然彼女のほうへ振り向いた。そのまなざしは初めてはっきりと焦点を合わせた。{/n}「我が子よ、君は暗黒の時に我らのもとに戻ってきた…」
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer03

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特还没把话说完，先知就突然朝她转过了头，他的目光第一次看起来这么清醒、专注。{/n}“孩子啊，你在这黑暗的时刻回到了我们身边……”
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for Yrliet to finish her sentence, the Farseer suddenly turns his head toward her. For the first time, his gaze is clear and focused.{/n} "Child, you have returned to us at a dark hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特还没把话说完，先知就突然朝她转过了头，他的目光第一次看起来这么清醒、专注。{/n}“孩子啊，你在这黑暗的时刻回到了我们身边……”
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer03

languages.text: {n}Sans atteindre qu'Yrliet termine sa phrase, le Grand Prophète tourne brusquement la tête vers elle. Pour la première fois, son regard est clair et posé.{/n} « Enfant, vous voilà de retour dans nos heures les plus sombres... »
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for Yrliet to finish her sentence, the Farseer suddenly turns his head toward her. For the first time, his gaze is clear and focused.{/n} "Child, you have returned to us at a dark hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans atteindre qu'Yrliet termine sa phrase, le Grand Prophète tourne brusquement la tête vers elle. Pour la première fois, son regard est clair et posé.{/n} « Enfant, vous voilà de retour dans nos heures les plus sombres... »
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer03

languages.text: {n}Ohne zu warten, bis Yrliet ihren Satz beendet, dreht sich der Runenprophet und schaut sie direkt an. Zum ersten Mal wirkt sein Blick klar und konzentriert.{/n} "Kind, Ihr seid in dunkelster Stunde zu uns zurückgekehrt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for Yrliet to finish her sentence, the Farseer suddenly turns his head toward her. For the first time, his gaze is clear and focused.{/n} "Child, you have returned to us at a dark hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ohne zu warten, bis Yrliet ihren Satz beendet, dreht sich der Runenprophet und schaut sie direkt an. Zum ersten Mal wirkt sein Blick klar und konzentriert.{/n} "Kind, Ihr seid in dunkelster Stunde zu uns zurückgekehrt ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer03

languages.text: {n}Ötesezen, daha cümlesini bitirmesini beklemeden ani bir hareketle kafasını Yrliet'e çeviriyor. Bakışlarında ilk defa bir netlik ve kararlılık görünüyor.{/n} "Evladım, bize çok zor bir zamanda geri döndün..."
languages.original_text: {n}Without waiting for Yrliet to finish her sentence, the Farseer suddenly turns his head toward her. For the first time, his gaze is clear and focused.{/n} "Child, you have returned to us at a dark hour..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ötesezen, daha Yrliet'in cümlesini bitirmesini beklemeden ani bir hareketle kafasını ona çeviriyor. Bakışlarında ilk defa netlik ve kararlılık görünüyor.{/n} "Evladım, bize çok zor bir zamanda geri döndün..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer03
